scripts.build-todo: tsp compile sample/main.tsp --emit @typespec/efv2-zod-sketch --output-dir sample/output/todo && babel sample/output/todo -d dist/sample/output/todo --extensions '.ts,.tsx' && npx prettier sample/output --write && npm install --prefix sample/output/todo/@typespec/efv2-zod-sketch
scripts.build-petstore: tsp compile ../samples/specs/petstore/petstore.tsp --emit @typespec/efv2-zod-sketch --output-dir sample/output/petstore && babel sample/output/petstore -d dist/sample/output/petstore --extensions '.ts,.tsx' && npx prettier sample/output --write
